Contact Us
HAVE QUESTIONS?
NEED MORE INFORMATION?
We’re here to help! You can reach us by phone, email, or use our handy contact form and one of our representatives will be happy to help answer any questions or concerns you may have.
9060 SW 99TH ST RD, Ocala, FL 34481
(352) 854-8430
info@ontopoftheworldgolfclub.com
.entry-content

We’re here to help! You can reach us by phone, email, or use our handy contact form and one of our representatives will be happy to help answer any questions or concerns you may have.

.entry-content

Meet Our Team
Matt Hibbs, PGA
Director of Golf
Matt Hibbs, Director of Golf at On Top of the World Communities, LLC, has been with the company since 2009. Matt was born in Flint, Michigan and relocated to Florida in 2005 when he joined the Walt Disney World Golf Team. He attended Ferris State University and graduated with a degree in Professional Golf Management. There, Matt worked his way through the ranks from a golf apprentice to a Class A Golf Professional and Manager within one year. In 2009, Matt left Disney to become the Head Golf Professional at Candler Hills Golf Club and in 2012, his hard work paid off when he became the On Top of the World Director of Golf.“To me, On Top of the World is family, customer service, great principles and education,” he said. After all of his years of service, Matt would like to be remembered as a person that was very helpful to others. “I want the golf department’s legacy, under my leadership, to be known as a staff who had a genuine concern for our residents and who always went above and beyond to help others,” he said with a smile.
GOLF PROFESSIONALS
Russ Smith, PGA
Head Golf Professional
On Top of the World Golf Club
Russ Smith, Is a Class A PGA Golf Professional and The Head Golf Professional at On Top of the World Communities, LLC, he has been with the company since 2007. Russ was born in Ocala, Florida and grew up in the small town of Crystal River. He graduated high school in 2007 and while attending the College of Central Florida he joined the Candler Hills Golf Club staff at the age of 18. There, he worked his way through the ranks from a Shop Attendant to Assistant Golf Professional at Candler Hills Golf Club and then was promoted again to be the Head Golf Professional for On Top of the World Golf Club where he has worked since then. “It means a lot to be part of this family and a family is what On Top of the World is. We all have a part to play to make it a success and by helping your family, you show them you care,” says Russ. When he’s ready to take the next step in life, Russ would like to leave a legacy of FUN. “I would like to be remembered as the guy who always came to work with a smile on my face, a great attitude and always found a way to have fun no matter what we were doing,” adds Russ.
Denise Mullen, LPGA
Head Golf Professional
Candler Hills Golf Club
Denise joined On Top of the World in 2010 working in both On Top of the World and Candler Hills Golf Operations. Since 2010, she has promoted league participation for both Men’s Golf Association (MGA) and Ladies Golf Association (LGA). Denise organized a Ladies Only Clinic that is held every other week and was instrumental in fostering a relationship with The First Tee of Greater Ocala. Candler Hills Golf Club is now officially a recognized site for hosting LPGA-USGA Girls Golf Classes where Denise is the Site Director for the program. In her spare time, Denise is a member of the Talk of the World Toastmasters group. “I love people and providing the best possible experience for the customer; golf has been my passion for 50 years,” says Denise. We are all about making “Magic Moments” for our members, residents and guests!
COURSE MAINTENANCE
Brant Fletcher
OTOW Superintendent
Brant Fletcher is a Class A Golf Course Superintendent and has been with the company since 2020. He serves as the Superintendent for the two resident golf courses at the On Top of the World Golf Club in Ocala. Brant was born in Dublin, Texas but spent his youth and most of his adult life in South Georgia, where he grew up hunting, fishing, camping and learning to love the outdoors. His love of golf, coupled with his passion for the outdoors eventually led to his decision to make a career for himself in the Golf Industry. He earned an Associate’s Degree in Turf grass Management from Abraham Baldwin Agricultural College in Tifton, Georgia and worked his way up through the industry ranks from Spray Technician to Superintendent. Brant relocated to Florida in January of 2020 to occupy the position he now holds. “On Top of the World Communities is a great company to work for. The people here are really friendly and the company itself is very family oriented. I’m blessed to have such a great opportunity”.
Andrew Jorgensen, CGCS
Director of Community Maintenance Operations
Andrew Jorgensen, CGCS is the Director of Community Maintenance Operations at On Top of the World Communities, LLC in Ocala, Florida. He has been with the company since 2005 and manages all community maintenance and golf operation activities. Andrew was born in Kansas City, Missouri and relocated to Florida after spending his youth growing up outside of Atlanta, Georgia. He obtained two Associate degrees in Golf Turf Management and Commercial Turf Management from Abraham Baldwin Agricultural College in Tifton, Georgia. Later, Andrew received a certificate in Turf Management from the University of Georgia. Andrew achieved the Certified Golf Course Superintendent designation in 2012 from the Golf Course Superintendents Association of America. In 2014, Andrew became a Certified Landscape Industry Manager from the National Association of Landscape Professionals. In 2014 and again in 2017, he accepted the GCSAA/Golf Digest Environmental Leaders in Golf Award, and in 2022 was awarded the President’s Award for Environmental Stewardship from the Golf Course Superintendents Association of America, further proving his commitment to the environment and the community in which so many call home. Andrew was the recipient of the Florida Turfgrass Association’s highest award, The Wreath of Grass, in 2020 recognizing his outstanding contributions towards the Florida turfgrass industry. He is heavily involved within the industry serving as an officer and board member of various turfgrass related organizations including Past President of the Florida Golf Course Superintendent Association and the Florida Turfgrass Association, President of the Seven Rivers Golf Course Superintendents Association and Vice President of the Environmental Research and Education Foundation. He is also involved locally with Leadership Ocala/Marion through the Ocala/Marion County Chamber and Economic Partnership serving as Vice Chair and serves on the advisory board for the University of Florida Institute for Food & Agricultural Sciences Plant Science and Research and Education Unit in Citra, Florida.
.entry-content
